snippet: At least 2 of the 12 French Islamists arrested in raids on Saturday were planning to join jihadists fighting the government of President Bashar al-Assad in Syria.
lead_paragraph: At least 2 of the 12 French Islamists arrested in raids on Saturday were planning to join jihadists fighting the government of President Bashar al-Assad in Syria.

headline.main: France: 2 Arrested Islamists Were Headed for Syria, Prosecutor Says
